mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( member_id, board_title, board_content, board_date ) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, Now() )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no boardNo, member_id memberId, board_title boardTitle, board_content boardContent, board_date boardDate FROM board WHERE board_no=#{boardNo}
select board_no boardNo, member_id memberId, board_title boardTitle, board_content boardContent, board_date boardDate from board limit #{startRow},#{rowPerPage}
